unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhai! Important for us farmers, especially with these unpredictable monsoons. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps, but getting the claim is always a struggle! Last year, Ramesh uncle from our gaon, got practically nothing even after the floods on 10/07/2023. Hope things improve. Need it before sowing season starting 15/06/2024 at 10:00 hrs. Otherwise, what's the point? My neighbour, Geeta aunty, got some compensation though, after the hailstorm on 01/03/2024. Maybe luck. Should be simpler, like paying your bijli bill!
